attributes.comment:
Support is approved if the following:
1. Immigration priority is shifted to Immediate Family First. (Spouses and
Children) If we want increased productivity from our citizens families should be
united using I129F within 90 days. As was the reality of our system before the
Secretary of State recinded permanately the Authority of US Embassies to
process I130's.
2. Double or Triple the fees to make this processing possible or allow citizens or
companies to pay expediting fees equal to two or three times the regular fees to
expedite the process.
3. American should be a Family First Nation the policy of making spouses and
children wait a year or more is counterproductive.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Dennis M. Schaefer
